title: Procedure
fullText:
The test procedure for measurement of touch voltage is shown in Figure 4.32. A high impedance voltmeter, i.e. an input impedance greater than 5 MΩ, is required.
NOTE 1 A 2 kΩ resistor is used to simulate the body resistance of a typical person.
NOTE 2 Numbers indicate test sequence.
NOTE 3 The 2 kΩ resistor is a simplified version of the circuits shown in AS/NZS 60990.
